XenotypeDef.label: Drow
XenotypeDef.description: Also known as dark elves, this dark-skinned sub-race of elves lived in the overdark, the dark side of the moon. They developed exceptional vision in the dark and a preference for cold climates compared to their ancestors.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: An evolved humanoid from the dark side of a habitable moon in the outer rim.

XenotypeDef.label: Elf
XenotypeDef.description: An evolved humanoid from a habitable moon in the outer rim. Held together by a utopian society, elves have little experience in combat and bruise easily. They make exceptionally talented psycasters.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: An evolved humanoid from a habitable moon in the outer rim.

XenotypeDef.label: Goblin
XenotypeDef.description: A small, menacing cousin of the elves known for their green skin and dimwitted antics. Raised in swamps and caverns, these small humanoids were used as canon fodder by their Hobgoblin overlords. They multiply quickly and are surprisingly difficult to kill, but don't live very long.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: A small, menacing cousin of the elves known for their green skin and dimwitted antics.

XenotypeDef.label: hobgoblin
XenotypeDef.description: A massive, red-skinned goblinoid. Towering over their lesser kin, hobgoblins possess brutal strength and a violent temperament. Their presence is enough to turn the tide of battle.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: A massive, red-skinned goblinoid. Their presence is enough to turn the tide of battle.

XenotypeDef.label: wood elf
XenotypeDef.description: An evolved humanoid from a habitable moon in the outer rim. Wood elves rejected elven society to embrace a nomadic lifestyle. They are resilient to infections and foodborne illness, but retain their ancestors' delicate physiology.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: A nomadic elf from a habitable moon in the outer rim.
